text: @JamesMelville @axidentaliberal This is why we need Medicare for All. No fooling. Really. Press it. Move forward for it. With the wave of Covid-19 can you imagine what it's going to be like? Maybe that doc killed herself when she realized she could not choose who should live or die... I wonder.

entity.name: Imagine...
entity.description: Presenter Alan Yentob explores the world of the arts, not just in Britain but around the globe. But it's a broad definition of the arts. Episodes contain interviews with or about popular music acts like Simon and Garfunkel, U2 and the Rolling Stones. But others include a discussion of Van Goh's works or a tribute to playwright Simon Gray. Still others examine topics like the lost art of oratory, the art of stand-up comedy, the music of Rajasthan, the life of photographer Annie Leibovitz or the history of the guitar. It's an eclectic yet artistic mix of topics.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
